info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Watch issued July 29 at 5:26PM EDT until July 29 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WATCH 507 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 8 PM EDT THIS EVENING FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN VIRGINIA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 25 COUNTIES IN EAST CENTRAL VIRGINIA CHARLES CITY IN EASTERN VIRGINIA MATHEWS NORTHAMPTON IN SOUTH CENTRAL VIRGINIA BRUNSWICK LUNENBURG MECKLENBURG IN SOUTHEAST VIRGINIA CITY OF CHESAPEAKE CITY OF EMPORIA CITY OF FRANKLIN CITY OF HAMPTON CITY OF NEWPORT NEWS CITY OF NORFOLK CITY OF POQUOSON CITY OF PORTSMOUTH CITY OF SUFFOLK CITY OF VIRGINIA BEACH CITY OF WILLIAMSBURG GLOUCESTER GREENSVILLE ISLE OF WIGHT JAMES CITY SOUTHAMPTON SURRY SUSSEX YORK THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ANTE, BACONS CASTLE, BARHAM, BARNETTS, BAVON, BOOTH FORK, BOWERS HILL, BOYKINS, BRUNSWICK, BUFFORD CROSSROADS, BUSCH GARDENS, CAPE CHARLES, CENTERVILLE, CHASE CITY, CHESAPEAKE AIRPORT, CHIPPOKES STATE PARK, CHRISTENSONS CORNER, CLARESVILLE, CLARKSVILLE, COURTLAND, COWIE CORNER, CROAKER, DEEP CREEK, DURAND, EDGERTON, EMPORIA, EMPORIA AIRPORT, EMPORIA RESERVOIR, EWELL, EXMORE, FENTRESS, FIVE FORKS, FRANKLIN, GLOUCESTER POINT, GREAT BRIDGE, GREEN PLAIN, GREENBRIER, GROVE, GWALTNEY CORNER, HAMPTON, HOG ISLAND GAME RESERVE, HUNTERDALE, IVOR, KENBRIDGE, LAWRENCEVILLE, MOUNT PLEASANT, NEW POINT, NEW POINT COMFORT, NEWPORT NEWS, NORFOLK, PEARY, POOLESVILLE, POQUOSON, PORTSMOUTH, ROXBURY, SMITHFIELD, SOUTH HILL, SUFFOLK, TRIPLET, VALENTINES, VICTORIA, VIRGINIA BEACH, WAKEFIELD, WAVERLY, WAYSIDE, WHITE PLAINS, WILLIAMSBURG, AND YORKTOWN.
